embeds.title: King (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : King
The Fairy King excels in diverse elemental typings (Holy/Physical/Earth). Staff builds Bloom stacks for enormous offensive scaling; Book provides team damage reduction and powerful counter-attack healing; Wand regenerates magic points for ultimate-heavy compositions.
